overview: Once regarded as the international playboy spy, Black Rodgers finds himself dealing with a new challenge. Gone are the women, celebrity events and luxuries Rodgers once enjoyed only to be replaced with poverty and uncertainty as the evil Dr. Smirk Barrows rises to overpower mankind. Will Rodgers arise to the hero he once was? Will Barrows be defeated? Only time will tell!
title: Black Rodgers: Love from the 80's
